description: Zacatecas Silver Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties in Mexico. The company explores for silver and gold resources. It owns 100% interests in the Zacatecas project, which covers as area of 7,826 hectares located in the Zacatecas State, Mexico; and the Esperanza project that consists of 8 mining concessions covering an area of 14,338 hectares located in the Morelos State, Mexico. The company incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
